title: Ramadan Mubarak!
message: Taraweeh prayers will begin tonight immediately after Isha.

title: Jummah Time Change
message: Starting this Friday, the first Khutbah will begin at 1:15 PM.

title: New Carpet Installation
message: The main hall will be closed for maintenance until Asr prayer.

title: Community Iftar
message: Join us every Saturday for a community potluck iftar.
